body_html:
The TensorFlowEstimator class had save() and restore() functions, but then that the class was deprecated. Are there plans to add the same functions to the Estimator class?

I noticed there is an export_estimator() function, but I can't find the corresponding import_estimator(). What would you suggest for someone how needs to save/restore a model now?
body_text:
The TensorFlowEstimator class had save() and restore() functions, but then that the class was deprecated. Are there plans to add the same functions to the Estimator class?
I noticed there is an export_estimator() function, but I can't find the corresponding import_estimator(). What would you suggest for someone how needs to save/restore a model now?
body:
The TensorFlowEstimator class had save() and restore() functions, but then that the class was deprecated. Are there plans to add the same functions to the Estimator class? 

I noticed there is an export_estimator() function, but I can't find the corresponding import_estimator(). What would you suggest for someone how needs to save/restore a model now?
